item.title: Cubik Architecture
item.description: Responds to size, orientation, fullscreen or windowed image swiping. Crafted with pleasure and talented modern designer Joffrey Jochum. Visit the website

item.title: Elfassy Barrès Associés
item.description: Very light, very fast, highly responsive, generated using Phrozn. It’s also using twitter 1.1 OAuth'd API to get the homepage feed. Crafted with pleasure and designer Joffrey Jochum. Review the A-grade benchmark, or visit the website.
